nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.ads

Interface AdServiceLocal

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AdService, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdServiceImpl

    public interface AdServiceLocal
extends AdService
    Local interface. It must be used only from other services.
